pages.text: contracts are otherworldly pacts purchased from demons.$(br2)they can be signed with a taglock, after which using it will apply its conditions on whoever "signed" it.$(br2)while most contracts are usually signed in self-interest, some, like death, are best used on other people.

contracts last seven days.$(br2)always keep in mind that contracts, as demonic things do, are usually two sided, and will affect whoever signed them or forced them.$(br2)maybe attaining someone's favor could negate that.
